                                                    <div class="m-b-10 m-b-lg-20 why-point-icon">
                                <img decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2090%2090'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Hands on icon" data-lazy-src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Hands-on-icon.webp"><noscript><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Hands-on-icon.webp" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Hands on icon" /></noscript>                            </div>
                        
                        <h3 class="mb-2 m-b-lg-15 title">
                            Hands-On Training                        </h3>

                        <p class="mb-0">
                            Hands-on training starts on your first day! Learn to use industry-standard equipment, enhance your professional communication skills, and more!                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4">
                    <div class="why-point">
                                                    <div class="m-b-10 m-b-lg-20 why-point-icon">
                                <img decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2090%2090'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Financial Aid" data-lazy-src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/financial-aid-icon.svg"><noscript><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/financial-aid-icon.svg" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Financial Aid" /></noscript>                            </div>
                        
                        <h3 class="mb-2 m-b-lg-15 title">
                            Financial Aid                        </h3>

                        <p class="mb-0">
                            Let our team explain the aid options available to you! These include federal grants and loans, VA education benefits, scholarships, and payment plans.                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4">
                    <div class="why-point">
                                                    <div class="m-b-10 m-b-lg-20 why-point-icon">
                                <img decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2090%2090'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Work opportunities" data-lazy-src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/work-opportunities-icon.svg"><noscript><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/work-opportunities-icon.svg" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Work opportunities" /></noscript>                            </div>
                        
                        <h3 class="mb-2 m-b-lg-15 title">
                            Career Placement Assistance                        </h3>

                        <p class="mb-0">
                            Graduates receive career placement assistance, including support with resume writing, interview preparation, and referrals for available employment opportunities.                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4">
                    <div class="why-point">
                                                    <div class="m-b-10 m-b-lg-20 why-point-icon">
                                <img decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2090%2090'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="online-on-campus-icon" data-lazy-src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/online-on-campus-icon.svg"><noscript><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/online-on-campus-icon.svg" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="online-on-campus-icon" /></noscript>                            </div>
                        
                        <h3 class="mb-2 m-b-lg-15 title">
                            Flexible Classes                        </h3>

                        <p class="mb-0">
                            Students receive skills-based training on-campus in laboratory facilities and knowledge-based training online in our learning management system.                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4">
                    <div class="why-point">
                                                    <div class="m-b-10 m-b-lg-20 why-point-icon">
                                <img decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2090%2090'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Own laptop" data-lazy-src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/own-laptop-icon.svg"><noscript><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="90" height="90" src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/own-laptop-icon.svg" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="Own laptop" /></noscript>                            </div>
                        
                        <h3 class="mb-2 m-b-lg-15 title">
                            Individual Laptops                        </h3>

                        <p class="mb-0">
                            Students are provided with individual laptops and comprehensive technical support to ensure they can always complete their online coursework.                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4">
                    <div class="why-point">
                                                    <div class="m-b-10 m-b-lg-20 why-point-icon">
                                <img decoding="async" width="128" height="90" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20128%2090'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="committed-career-service-team" data-lazy-src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/committed-career-service-team.svg"><noscript><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="128" height="90" src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/committed-career-service-team.svg" class="attachment-full size-full" alt="committed-career-service-team" /></noscript>                            </div>
                        
                        <h3 class="mb-2 m-b-lg-15 title">
                            Career Opportunities                        </h3>

                        <p class="mb-0">
                            There is strong employment demand for our graduates and opportunities for growth in responsibilities and earnings within each career path we offer.                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>

<script type="rocketlazyloadscript" data-minify="1" data-rocket-src="https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/wp-content/cache/min/1/ajax/libs/lottie-web/5.9.6/lottie.min.js?ver=1747832672" data-rocket-defer="" defer=""></script>
<script type="rocketlazyloadscript">
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        // Define base URL for JSON animations
        const baseIconUrl = "https://www.northwestcareercollege.edu/cdn/icon-animation/";
        const wouldRecommend = baseIconUrl + "would-recommend.json?1747833279";
        const overallSatisfaction = baseIconUrl + "overall-satisfaction.json?1747833279";

        // Function to load Lottie animation dynamically
        function loadLottieAnimation(containerId, animationUrl) {
            fetch(animationUrl)
                .then(response => response.json())
                .then(data => {
                    lottie.loadAnimation({
                        container: document.getElementById(containerId),
                        renderer: 'svg',
                        loop: false,
                        autoplay: true,
                        animationData: data
                    });
                })
                .catch(error => console.error("Error loading animation:", error));
        }

        // Intersection Observer Setup
        const observerOptions = {
            root: null, // Observe in the viewport
            rootMargin: "-20% 0px -20% 0px",
            threshold: 0.5 // Trigger when 50% of the element is visible
        };

        function handleIntersection(entries, observer) {
            entries.forEach(entry => {
                if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                    const containerId = entry.target.id;
                    const animationUrl = containerId === "animation-container" ? wouldRecommend : overallSatisfaction;

                    // Load animation if it's in the viewport
                    loadLottieAnimation(containerId, animationUrl);

                    // Unobserve after playing animation once
                    observer.unobserve(entry.target);
                }
            });
        }

        // Create observer
        const observer = new IntersectionObserver(handleIntersection, observerOptions);

        // Target elements to observe
        const targets = document.querySelectorAll("#animation-container, #animation-container-like");
        targets.forEach(target => {
            observer.observe(target);

            // 🔹 Manually check if element is already in viewport on load
            const rect = target.getBoundingClientRect();
            const windowHeight = window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight;
            if (rect.top >= 0 && rect.bottom <= windowHeight) {
                handleIntersection([{ target, isIntersecting: true }], observer);
            }
        });
    });
</script>

                }

			<script type="rocketlazyloadscript">
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>
